name: Digital business transformation
description:
Digital strategy consulting services.

Publicis Sapient is rated highly in six areas by clients, including:

- Transferring knowledge and skills to clients' employees
- Functional-specific digital strategy capabilities
- Supporting capabilities in technology
- Delivering value-creating innovation
- Differentiation from its competitors
- Client willingness to recommend the vendor to any company

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer - Senior Associate
jobs.description:
As the Senior Associate/Engineer – DevOps within Publicis Sapient, you will be working within an agile development process as well as being part of a team responsible for the design and implementation of application build, release, deployment and configuration activities.  

Being part of the DevOps Engineering team, you will be able to adjust to constant business change; common types of changes include new requirements, evolving goals and strategies, and emerging technologies.  

You will also be interacting, developing, engineering and communicating collaboratively at a technical level with clients, vendors, partners, and all levels of colleagues within Publicis Sapient.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
As the Senior Associate/Engineer – DevOps within Publicis Sapient, you will be working within an agile development process as well as being part of a team responsible for the design and implementation of application build, release, deployment and configuration activities.

Being part of the DevOps Engineering team, you will be able to adjust to constant business change; common types of changes include new requirements, evolving goals and strategies, and emerging technologies.

You will also be interacting, developing, engineering and communicating collaboratively at a technical level with clients, vendors, partners, and all levels of colleagues within Publicis Sapient.
